resources.string:
A physics model of a Newton's Cradle, with added Clock for Nat B.
Balls are touch draggable to create motion and also affected by accelerometer.

Twitter: @geekyouup
Source at: http://newtonscradle.googlecode.com

Use the flip option so that you can stand your G1 on a table.

Tap the bottom of the screen to turn clock on and off
